name: Slogo Ray 2022
description:
You and your friend are connected by a laser beam Enemies will come to kill you Kill them using your laser and dash ability

Hi, my name is Alex, and this is my official first multiplayer game. You can play it online with a friend and you will share a laser beam connected to both of you. The objective is to kill as many enemies as possible with the laser beam! Stay aware! It wont be so easy :) 

CONTROLS

movement wasd/arrowkeys

dash space

CREDITS

All the game art was made by myself, the only asset that I used is for the fantasy characters.

The asset is named "100 Fantasy Characters Mega Pack" and the author is Blackthornprod
